page.title: 09THE CHURCH IN THE COMMUNITY
page.content: Within our area 10 to 12% of the pop. go church, more than twice the number in towns. 15 years ago the church in Collier St. nearly closed through lack of support. Growth has been steady since then. The curate (also of Yalding & Laddingford) is a "non stipendury minister". He maintains his job as Communications Manager in an oil comp. Within the community Colin conducts services, baptisms & weddings but not funerals as he is in London when people want to be buried midweek! He visits people, leads home groups and attends various meetings e.g.worship committee and the P.C.C. He does 2 jobs really but, as he says, he has one function: he is a priest in all he does. The church gives people a "vision outside themselves". There is a regular Sunday Eucharist and services at other times like healing services.
